title: Kicked out of Club
body:
I got kicked out of my own club so i cant see it, but i am still shown as the leader. this happened when the clubs went down, and i haven't got it fixed yet. I've submitted a ticket and nothing came of it have any of yall got this problem fixed? i tried getting on the mobile app but when i try to leave it just gives me an error message but it still shows that i am in it.

could anyone tell me how they fixed/ left their own club

replies.body: I have the same problem could you please help
idk when you last tried submitting a ticket, but you should try again.  it took like a day but they were able to get it resolved.
I am having the exact same problem. bumping for justice
idk when you last tried submitting a ticket, but you should try again.  it took like a day but they were able to get it resolved

There was a [club outage](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) that caused some issues like this for some club owners.  This should now be resolved, but we can look into your specific issue.  Just hit us up in a new [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll get back to you!
would it be fine if i've submitted a ticket about this before?
Your previous ticket is a bit older, and the issue should have been resolved.  A new ticket will help offer a fresh look!
